resources.string:
"Register: 

" "User have to go to Go to user/member section and enter college id and password " "and Manager also have to enter the password and Click on Register button for verifying " "registration process. User will not be able to register if enter wrong ID or not belongs " "to the oraganization of IIIT Allahabad.

"
"Mail Registration: 

" "This is a crucial process.User have to register the email address for entering into CC3 " "building which is to be getting verified by the manager.A system generated mail will be " "sent to the user who will regier themselves into the system and that mail will say that - " "YOU'RE REGISTERED.

"
"Login: 

" "After registering successfully user can login into the system by entering UserID and " "Passsword and Click on login button.

"
"Exit: 

" "Now User can logout if he wants to end the current session or move forward by pressing " "Exit button on the page.

"
"Change Password:

" "If User wants to change the current password, he can change it by clicking CHANGE PASSWORD " "button just below Exit button.

"
"Schedule : 

" "This Button is used for scheduling the time alollted to user 

" "Getting Alert:

" "Warning!! If user gets the mail from the system after expiring time limit for session, he " "has to leave the building immediately after getting this notification message.

"
